attributes.action: Small Heath Birmingham Car Insurance is unfair and too high.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to lower the car insurance premiuns for residents of Small Heath Birmingham who have not claimed or comitted any Fraud.

Why should we suffer and be punished collectively for the crimes committed by a handful of people who do not even live in Small Heath Birmingham.

Treat us as we deserve and assess the premiums on an individual basis.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.
